[Section: Page 29 of 1048]



Summer (Assume Phase 2)
-Each get two weeks vacation. Max dependant.
Robert sobriety plan
- Christine should not bear the cost of tests. Not my issue. Can pay for tests once past the 2 years, if requested and clean.
- Failed test, back to testing for remainder of time Adrian subject to parenting plan. No over nights, day visits, until sobriety plan is approved.
Message 125 of 4024
I sent mine. I was hoping that we would mark up the doc. This way may be a challenge. Hope we can work together on this.
Sent:12/29/2023 at 07:41 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 07:46 AM)
Subject:Re: Parenting Plan discussion points
Message 126 of 4024
Ok, thanks. Here is what your proposed plan reflects in terms of % time split between the kids with you and I with your suggested alterations as a
percentage of time split:
Phase I in the best "opt in" case is:

- Max is 99/1
- For Both 93/7
Phase II in the best "opt in" case is:

- Max is 98/2
- For Both 80/20

From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 09:04 AM)
Subject:Re: Parenting Plan discussion points

Stop the multiple calls to my cell phone and text messages. It is not an emergency.
Do not email me at work.
We are unable to have a civil conversation so should cease phone calls immediately.
Sent:12/29/2023 at 09:58 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 09:59 AM)
Subject:Stop the harassment

Message 128 of 4024
It's been months since we started the parenting plan discussion. We were 1% from being done. You took the entire time discussing your edits and we
did not even open my doc. Please let me know when we can unblock this and finish to get this across the line.
Sent:12/29/2023 at 09:59 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 10:02 AM)
Subject:Urgent
Message 129 of 4024
I don't want to fight. Please let me know when we can finish this. It is not harassment when we had a planned call. You just hung up because you got
pissed off again and choose to find another reason not to finish the parenting plan. I want to finish this in a civil way. Please don't create barriers. I
want to work with you and I showed you that. Please work with me.
Sent:12/29/2023 at 10:01 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 10:02 AM)
Subject:Re: Stop the harassment
Message 130 of 4024
Tue, Jan 02 at 2:00
Sent:12/29/2023 at 10:17 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 10:21 AM)
Subject:Can I grab this?
Message 131 of 4024
You said Tuesday, but I think we should try to make time before your first day back at work after the holiday.
I’d love to get this to Dr Brown sooner than later for her feedback to close this out before starting another year.
Thoughts?
Sent:12/29/2023 at 05:53 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 09:02 PM)
Subject:Parenting Plan Review
Message 132 of 4024
You can always check with me and see if I’m not busy. AD and I can watch a movie while you are doing your thing. You still get what you want and
we have some to do rather than sit alone. Seems like a win win?
Sent:12/29/2023 at 07:51 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 09:02 PM)
Subject:When you are out on weekends

Message 133 of 4024
I guess we should clarify expectations. I thought based on your guidance, that you would check OFW before you head out for your night.
But you quit checking this afternoon and now it’s passed 8:00. So not really helpful to have you check at this point since it’s past our cutoff.
Is that what you had in mind? I want to work with ya!
Have a fun night out!
Sent:12/29/2023 at 08:14 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 09:03 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Comms Guidelines
Message 134 of 4024
You are clearly using this platform in a way that it was not intended. Nothing you send is urgent nor does it need an immediate response but a
disguised attempt to get me to engage.
I do not interfere with your time nor should you with mine. The inference below “before you head out for your night” is inflammatory and it against
guidelines that my private life is my private life as is yours.
We are aligned on phase 1 so no need to accelerate discussions. Frankly I agree with Dr Brown and we cease verbal communication and we need to
adjust communication on this platform as well.
The three emails you sent clearly escalate in tone and none require immediate response.
I’ll confer with my lawyer on Tuesday on suggestions for modifications but this clearly is not working and does not prevent you from behavior that is
controlling and triggering.
Adrian will be dropped off at 9am.
Sent:12/29/2023 at 09:24 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2023 at 09:33 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Comms Guidelines
Message 135 of 4024
What the heck is that? I am not doing anything wrong and I did not expect a response. You are trying to make me look and feel bad. That was not my
intention at all. You read something into everything I say. Just like you thought I was stalking you on here. But I am getting an alert. It just wrong.
Please take a step back and work with me. I’m trying to partner please. I am not trying to dig at you.
Sent:12/29/2023 at 09:36 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/30/2023 at 08:18 AM)
Subject:Re: Your Comms Guidelines

Message 136 of 4024
Ok. Tonight you said you are not going to work on the parenting plan anymore. We are a one hour conversation away (because we only covered your
stuff) from getting this months long goat rodeo of misdirection finished.
I realize we both think the other is the reason we can’t get it done so I won’t argue that. It’s wasted breath and finger pointing. But please let me know
if you are refusing to work on it as we both think we have been trying since September.
You seem hell bent on making this whole affair acrimonious at all costs at every turn. Making zero effort to even get the help Dr Brown said in person
and in email that we should get ASAP. Maybe you know better than the pro.
I don’t get that, but I’ll accept it.
Sent:12/29/2023 at 10:02 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/30/2023 at 08:18 AM)
Subject:Re: Parenting Plan Review
Message 137 of 4024
I sent you all our agreed to revisions in an updated and cleaned up doc via email. I also documented your new proposals that were never discussed
with Dr Brown. I trust they are accurate or you will clarify.
Please see the same content of the email for additional clarity as well for your record keeping here on OFW below. Hoping you will work on this. I am
planning to move forward and want it baked in 2023.
I really do want to work with you to start the new year.
Sincerely wishing you the best.
From email:

Christine-
Please take a look at the attachment. If we have agreed on Phase I, that is great. Let's go ahead and move forward. I have updated the doc with "track
changes" turned on.
Obviously, we are not at all in agreement for Phase II. Specifically, if the best I can even do is 65/35 for AD with zero guaranteed for Max. And
unnecessary disruption for them.
I also never get a real vacation in your plan, as it has to be within Uber distance. Spring Break will give you Hong Kong, California Theme Parks, and
Cabo all in a row with Mom.
Perhaps the easiest way to review is to start by accepting changes, looking at the way it reads to assure you are OK with the suggested updates, and
seeing notes on the side.
I'm looking forward to your feedback so we can send the areas of disagreement to Dr. Brown. She can provide suggestions for mutually disappointing
tiebreaks, and we move forward.
Sent:12/30/2023 at 08:08 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/30/2023 at 08:18 AM)
Subject:Re: Parenting Plan Review

Thanks
robert

I will look at the document and send back edits by eod Sunday.

Sent:12/31/2023 at 04:08 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/31/2023 at 04:09 PM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
Message 145 of 4024
You always have an excuse. For everything. If you can’t make time to have a talk about our child given the way he has responded to this situation
forget it. If you really don’t see a problem here that we urgently need professional help with I don’t know what to do.
Your way has not worked since Yurushaka when we promised to talk about discernment. Please recognize history for a moment and consider if we
have a problem we should address constructively. We used to work together even after this started. It worked.
Then you started shutting down our efforts. Stopping any help to understand the other’s perspective, or heal. Creating a destructive self fulfilling
prophecy of disaster. It’s not working. It’s getting worse. Please consider working with me before the courts make us.
Today this all started when I tried to do you a favor. Then another. Then you insult me and start a fight. I’m sure I do that crap as well to you. But we
should learn how to step back, own our own self-determination. And stop. But we really need help to do that.
I was dark all weekend so this would not happen. But we will have to talk sometime. Like we should for Max’s mental health. This is a very high stakes
game. Let’s please treat it with the care and respect it deserves. So we can talk about our kids mental health.
I’m really trying. Just tell me your terms even. I’ll likely do anything to be better parents because the status quo is not working. It’s really not a win if
Sent:12/31/2023 at 04:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/31/2023 at 04:40 PM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)

we just continue to put up walls instead of building bridges. I’m not asking for forgiveness. Just cooperation.
Please let’s start the new year with an excuse to do better.
Message 146 of 4024
The solution offered by the professional was reunification therapy with Max which I hope will start soon
The professional also recommended we not talk directly but communicate through this app. I agree with that recommendation as it has been not
good for either of our mental health.
As Adrian transitions back to me I request you respect the same courtesy afforded you during your time with him and refrain from communications
unless essential. We both agree that has worked well.
Sent:12/31/2023 at 04:46 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/31/2023 at 04:46 PM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
Message 147 of 4024
So Dr Brown said
- Marriage therapy with all three of us on Sat
- Divorce therapy to us in an email Thursday
- You are saying that she said don’t talk at all
It’s fair to say:
- we have heard different things each time
- we choose the one that we each want to hear
- none of it is working and we are ignoring that
So what is the definition of insanity?
Why are you fighting against trying to learn to work together? Really? Is it for appearances to someone else? Is it pride? It’s not working. It’s our kids
mental health. Quit hearing what you want to hear and only adopting what you want. For Christ’s sake Christine, let’s try something that allows us to
work together.
Is it that dangerous? What do we have to loose?

Hi Robert,
I’d like to discuss Adrian’s school situation and his ongoing unhappiness at ICS. We have had conversations over the past few months in regards to his
experience and I am increasingly concerned for what he expresses to me.
Options

It is clear to me ICS is not a good fit and am worried the longer he stays in that system, the more frustrated he becomes.
Option 1 and 2 are certainly pricey but I’d like to seriously consider it. I was going to bring it up once there was more certainty on the job front on
your end, but after a conversation we had tonight I don’t believe I can wait any longer.
Let me know a good time to connect on this, this week.
Thank you
Christine

Please don't take any of this as a knock on you. I'm just very concerned for him these days.

Why do you want everyone to know
Why do you insist on telling everyone

Move all conversations here.
Message 176 of 4024
If we need something urgent then the rules were to call or text. You escalated a conversation just now, hung up for no reason, and acted like I was
escalating. You create a false narrative for your own needs. I need to be able to have contact for the safety of my kids as we agreed. So moving off of
this until we agree that we will follow the plan that was laid out.

Move everything to OFW from now on. All kid and non kid related.

Sent:01/02/2024 at 05:04 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/02/2024 at 05:05 PM)
Subject:Re: Moving back off OFW
Message 178 of 4024
Christine, it’s kind of an issue for me. I think in our parenting plan it discusses undermining each other. And that includes too friends of our child’s
parents. Specifically in this case, you lied to me and you told me that you had not told our deepest and dearest friends of 16 years. But I found out
when they texted me about how I was doing. You always lie about anything that you want but then have a clever excuse that it’s all justified. So when
you are violating the terms of our parenting plan, undermining me as it stipulates not to, and lying about it, that becomes an issue for me.

From:Robert Moyer
